channel.title: IP TabQuest
channel.description: How Can i Remove The Quest Tab Things. And Add My Own

item.title: IP TabQuest
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Search for the “sayings” on the quest tab.

Usually it’s done retarded like:

public void questTabPlz() { for(Player players : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { players.getActionSender().sendString(queststuff, "Welcome to Habbablabba"); players.getActionSender().sendString(queststuff, "Your IP is:" + player.getSession().getHostIp()); } }
And putting that in process. Cul.

But if the programmer of your server did it in a more mannered way.

Where a player logs in:

String[] lines = { "Welcome to Habbablabba", "Your IP is:" + player.getSession().getHostIp()) }; for(String line : lines) { player.getActionSender().sendString(queststuff, line); }

soz when i was writing ythis i had 2 go to bloodwork so now i cant type fast or proper

Read full topic
